snippet: Masaaki Suzuki conducted Juilliard415 and the Yale Schola Cantorum on Sunday in a concert featuring Bach’s sacred and secular music.
abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews concert of Bach masses performed by Juilliard415 and Yale Schola Cantorum at Peter Jay Sharp Theater.
lead_paragraph: Masaaki Suzuki conducted Juilliard415 and the Yale Schola Cantorum on Sunday in a concert featuring Bach’s sacred and secular music.

headline.print_headline: Under a Specialist’s Baton, Two Ensembles Join Forces for Bach’s Masses
headline.main: Review: Juilliard415 and Yale Schola Cantorum Perform Bach’s Lutheran Masses
